entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
